text:
Status as a student shall create a rebuttable presumption that such person is unavailable for, or unable to accept, offers of employment. The presumption may be rebutted by satisfactory evidence being presented to the Department of Human Services of the student's opportunity and intent to seek employment on a full-time basis. 
(Amended by Ord. 212-80, App. 5/16/80; Ord. 152-98, App. 5/12/98)
